chinese: 严重地
english: badly

chinese: 男孩在学校里受了很严重的伤。
english: The boy was badly injured in school

chinese: n. 性，性别
english: gender

chinese: 这两个婴儿是不同的性别：男性和女性。
english: These two babies are of different genders: male and female

chinese: m.参考；引文 vt.附…•以供参考
english: reference

chinese: 这个写论文的学生正在翻书作为参考。
english: The student working on his paper is taking references from books

chinese: V 摆出高人一等的派头对待，屈尊对待；赞助，资助
english: patronize

chinese: 他感到很生气，因为他的同学以高人一等的派头对待他。
english: He was angry because his classmate patronized him

chinese: v.建造；作（图）；构筑
english: construct

chinese: 工人们正在建造一座高楼。
english: The workers are constructing a tall building

chinese: adj巨大的；极大的，极大量的；庞大的
english: enormous

chinese: 小女孩被这只巨大的泰迪犬震惊了。
english: The little girl was shocked by the enormous dog

chinese: cdj.整洁的；未经稀释的
english: neat

chinese: 抽屉里叠好的衣服看起来很整洁。
english: The folded clothes look very neat in the drawer

chinese: 四 叫卖，兜售
english: peddle

chinese: 推销员挨家挨户地兜售牙刷和梳子。
english: The salesman goes from door to door to peddle toothbrushes and combs

chinese: n.重点；强调；重要性
english: emphasis

chinese: 标亮单词，以示重点。
english: The word has been highlighted to provide emphasis

chinese: n. 素描 V 速写
english: sketch

chinese: 这位画家正在画一幅客厅的素描。
english: The artist is doing a sketch of the living room

chinese: n。行人，过路人
english: passerby

chinese: 我喜欢观察路上的行人并编造他们的故事。
english: I like to look at each passerby on the street and make up a story about them

chinese: adi. 数字的，用数字表示的
english: numerical

chinese: 这些黑色的键盘按键按照数字顺序排列。
english: The black keyboard keys are in numerical order

chinese: n. 地毯
english: carpet

chinese: 我把我的书放在了地毯上。
english: I put my books on the carpet

chinese: 几.探险；远征队；短途旅行；迅速
english: expedition

chinese: 他们去山上探险了。
english: They went on a mountain expedition

chinese: adv.偶尔地
english: occasionally

chinese: 他只是偶尔去健身房，大约一个月三次。
english: He only goes to the gym occasionally, about 3 times a month

chinese: v. 狼吞虎咽
english: devour

chinese: 这个大胡子男人正大口吃着巨型汉堡。
english: The bearded man is devouring a big burger
